posts.post_title: FS: T206 Old Mill Harry Hinchman SGC 60/5
posts.post_content:
Price is $103 delivered within the United States.

PayPal is fine. No need to "gift" your payment. (Check, cash, money order also OK).

A commitment to buy takes precedence over an ongoing negotiation. :rolleyes:
